column2: I'm running low on eggs, cheese, milk, bread, carrots and beer.
I need a ride to the hospital. It's a 60 minute drive from my house.
There is a parcel waiting for me at the gas station nearby.

column1: Get my car from the garage
column2: The car is ready to be picked up from the garage. The payment has already been done.

column1: Bring my car to the garage
column2: My car needs to be brought in to the garage for the yearly inspection.
